items.description: This is the first and only item in an unordered list. It represents a primary heading or a key topic identifier within the document, specifically 'Term of Employment'. For a screen reader user, this item signals the beginning of a section that will detail the conditions, duration, and other specifics related to an employment agreement or contract. It is presented as a standalone phrase, indicating a significant content division.

summary: This list, comprising a single item, identifies a primary section or key topic within the document, specifically 'Term of Employment'. It serves as an introductory label for content related to the duration and conditions of employment.
description: This is an unordered list containing one item. The item, 'Term of Employment', is located on Page 1 and functions as a prominent heading or a key topic identifier. For screen reader users, this tag explicitly conveys that 'Term of Employment' is a distinct content element, likely introducing a section that elaborates on the duration, conditions, and other relevant details of an employment agreement. This semantic tagging ensures that users of assistive technologies understand its importance as a navigational anchor and a descriptor of subsequent content.
